title: FS: Large lot of T205s with HOFers - Price Drop!

posts.post_title: FS: Large lot of T205s with HOFers - Price Drop!
posts.post_content:
Several T205s available here:

Fred Clarke - G = $40
Miller Huggins - SGC 30 = $50
Hugh Jennings - F = $35 - SOLD!
Christy Mathewson - P = $140
John McGraw - P (paperloss on front and back) = $42
Bobby Wallace (with cap) - P/F = $30
Cy Young - EX, but trimmed = $155 - SOLD!

T205 SGC commons:
Dooin SGC 30 = $20 - SOLD!
Dougherty Red Sock SGC 10 = $23
McLean SGC 40 = $30 - SOLD!
Moran No Stray Line SGC 40 = $22
Schmidt SGC 50 = $40

**I will be scanning more cards for your convenience here shortly.  As I was typing this, I hadn't realized that I didn't have them all done.

LMK!
Jimi
[url]jimivintage@yahoo.com[/url]
Just added Jennings, Mathewson, Clarke, and Wallace scan.  Matty has a little staining near the noticeably messed up corner on the back.  The rest of the backs are clean.
Email sent on trimmed Young, thanks!
Respond e-mail sent on the Young!  Thanks!
Drop in prices on all cards!  LMK if you need anything!
Bump for thanks for a nice looking cy young and great service.
